tool.name: intelc
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the Intel C/C++ compiler (Linux and Windows, version 7 and later). Calls the &t-gcc; or &t-msvc; (on Linux and Windows, respectively) to set underlying variables.

cvar.name: INTEL_C_COMPILER_VERSION
cvar.summary: Set by the "intelc" Tool to the major version number of the Intel C compiler selected for use.
